links.title: Apple TV+ market share grows in the US while Netflix loses ground to its competitors
links.description: Apple has been aggressively investing in Apple TV+, its own streaming platform with original movies and TV shows. While Apple TV+ market share grew in 2021, the platform is still far behind its competitors with only 5% market share in the United States.

message.body:
$AAPL 
🍏
Apple's business is mature enough that Tesla-size revenue gains aren't possible, but that isn't stopping shareholders from having high hopes. Consensus forecasts call for about🍏$118.4 billion in sales, producing earnings of 🍏$1.88 per share, up roughly 12% year over year.

https://www.fool.com/investing/2022/01/24/tesla-and-apple-will-make-or-break-the-nasdaq-this/

See Attachment.- Figure

links.title: Tesla and Apple Will Make or Break the Nasdaq This Week | The Motley Fool
links.description: The stock market continued to lose ground on Monday, and once again, the ( Nasdaq Composite NASDAQINDEX:^IXIC) took another big hit. As of 3 p.m. ET, the Nasdaq was down 251 points to 13,518. At its worst levels of the day, Monday's move lower for the Nasdaq brought its total decline since hitting all-time records just a few months ago to more than 19%.
